column1: Today is #SmallBusinessSaturday! Find your favorite #NY27 small businesses and make sure to visit them either online or in-store. Let’s support our local businesses and ensure they can keep providing our communities with the services we love! #shoplocal https://t.co/KN3F4xcM52

Reminder: Tomorrow is Small Business Saturday – and this year is more important than ever. Our small businesses in #NY27 need our support to stay open and continue building our communities. #shoplocal https://t.co/PNvVow52DH
I am wishing all Western New Yorkers  a Happy Thanksgiving! Please enjoy today responsibly stay safe and reflect on all we have to be grateful for in this country. https://t.co/5Qu9tBgkdE

Great news! Thanks to #OperationWarpSpeed the 1st wave of COVID vaccines could be deployed in mid-December. Thank you President Trump the entire Warp Speed team and all the devoted researchers who delivered a vaccine to the American people in record pace. https://t.co/tW2DOrxi2Y

I have sent a letter to the IJC asking for an increase in outflows from Lake Ontario for the winter 2021 season to help mitigate flooding damage to our shoreline communities. Read for more information: https://t.co/jYviuj1WPY

Enough with the politics. Democrats need to help us free the $138B ready to be used in the #PPP   Our small businesses are facing devastating shut-downs again.  We need relief now to ensure they can keep their doors open support employees and communities. https://t.co/XEwkMiNwIo

On #RuralHealthDay we recognize our rural hospitals for their vital role in confronting COVID-19 and the importance of ensuring rural areas can access care.  I proudly support legislation to ensure hospitals can access the resources they need and rural residents are supported. https://t.co/lbxaJA8TEG

There is still $138B allocated for the Paycheck Protection Program ready and waiting to be used. Small businesses are facing new restrictions and shutdowns – lets get this critical funding to them now so they can continue to stay open support employees and rebuild the economy. https://t.co/587jiQX30u

Dairy farmers in #NY27 can access resources to protect them from market fluctuations. The deadline to apply for 2021 @USDA Dairy Margin Coverage is December 11th 2020. For more information click the link below. https://t.co/XzUNBlXv2j

Its been 6 weeks since we met for legislative session and the needs of American families farmers and small businesses have only grown. #letswork towards bipartisan legislation to address these pressing needs.   @housegop is ready to work. The American people are counting on us. https://t.co/AlnBifZlPX

More excellent news from Operation Warp Speed: Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine shows 94.5% effectiveness in a new study.  American innovation continues to drive our nation forward and bring us closer to defeating COVID-19. https://t.co/q2Mh1bc72N
Thanks to the @CapitolPolice for being so nice to our Anna and making her a part of the team with her own badge sticker! https://t.co/Hnx5cbaPyZ

Important: Our Clarence District Office is without power today. If you need assistance today you can still visit the District Office in Geneseo or call 202-225-5265 or 585-519-4002. https://t.co/tpRCn5Y4uL

Honored to participate in the Veterans Day Ceremony this morning at the @BfloNavalPark. It was a very well done and humbling event. Thank  you to all our Western New York veterans for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/HXb3XNSs1R
Happy Veterans Day! To all those who have served or are serving today thank you for defending our freedoms. We are forever grateful 🇺🇸 https://t.co/PBKODEqiPo

NYS is facing a huge budget deficit and a stalled economy. That’s why I introduced the Infrastructure Expansion Act and have called upon Gov Cuomo to reform the Scaffold Law at the state level. We need to unleash our economy and attract investment into NYS https://t.co/Va6EORTTIR

Happy 245th Birthday to the @USMC. Thank you to the brave men and women who have answered the call and defended our nation honorably we are forever grateful for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/m3Y2FqGqul

Gov. Cuomo’s comments are irresponsible. An effective COVID-19 vaccine delivered under Operation Warp Speed is excellent news and should be celebrated by all Americans regardless of political party. Its this exact political obstructionist mindset that has held NY back for years https://t.co/UGGxCPt3xb

Great to celebrate the completion of the new revetment on Rte. 5 in Athol Springs. This will better ensure the safety of drivers from ice waves and debris. I strongly advocated for the completion of this project and I commend the @USACE_Buffalo for a job well done! https://t.co/GkxqVNVH1F

Great to join Assemblyman Morinello yesterday in Lewiston to have a round table with local business owners.  I gave them an update on my fight to extend the #ppp and also heard their concerns about rebuilding our economy. https://t.co/JVz9faxkLi

Proud to join @SenatorOrtt @Mike_Norris_144 and Chairwomen Wydysh and Johnson to highlight the importance of additional COVID-19 funding. I am proud to cosponsor the SMART Act and I’m working to get local governments the aid they need.  Read more: https://t.co/seOpFKE87C https://t.co/gj5RYx5KfF

Federal money should support American small businesses and employees – not China’s. That’s why I introduced the No Small Business Aid for China Act.  Read more: https://t.co/6TfIir3VBY https://t.co/8inNioCzhD
My full statement: https://t.co/6TfIir3VBY

The CHIPS Act would provide federal investments and incentives to manufacture semiconductors domestically. These components are used in electronics varying from consumer items to military technology. WNY is positioned to be a national/global leader in this advanced manufacturing.

To highlight specific legislation:   The Li Wenliang Global Health Accountability Act of 2020 gives the President authority to sanction individuals that aid in the cover up of a public health crisis - especially Chinese officials who were responsible for the lies about COVID-19.

Holding China accountable for COVID-19 and manipulative behavior is a matter of national security.  I’m proud to cosponsor the #ChinaTaskForceAct - a comprehensive bipartisan package of legislation to defend our IP rebuild American manufacturing and protect our economy. https://t.co/sjjmp7KvOI

Proud to join @bestselfwny today to announce over $1M in DOJ grants to help them provide critical services to our community.  Im committed to working to end the opioid crisis in our community and I look forward to a continued partnership with Bestself https://t.co/Dxcosr3e7N https://t.co/Pr4qZrX2Fe

Great meeting with Wendt’s Propane in Sanborn this week.   We had a productive discussion on issues facing the propane industry and exciting new applications for propane in the future.   They also raise awareness for great causes on their trucks thanks! https://t.co/r779E1l0Rs

Great meeting and tour of Niagara County Community College this week.  I’m proud to support our local higher education institutions that give quality educational experiences and job market access to our students.  Keep up the great work! https://t.co/OwegGc2HNf

The Farmers to Families Food Box program has been highly successful at supporting families and farmers. I commend the President and the @USDA for initiating another round of this program and for the impressive accomplishment of delivering over 110M boxes.  https://t.co/CLTitGzSOg

I’m saddened by the terrible tragedy that occurred this weekend in Lockport. My deepest condolences and prayers are with Cheyenne Farewell’s family and loved ones.   There is no place for this senseless violence in our community those responsible must be brought to justice.
Truly honored to recognize incredible Vietnam War veterans at the Springville American Legion this morning.  Thank you for your selfless service to our nation. https://t.co/jg59eNLxBU
Great to join the Livingston County Legislature this week to discuss my work in Congress to support Western New York and promote a strong economic recovery. https://t.co/ahIjSvRpbw

Excellent meeting last week with Sheriffs representing counties throughout #NY27.  I support our great law enforcement and I am committed to working with them to keep our constituents safe. https://t.co/o8vp0p9Qmy
Excellent meeting with the Wyoming County Legislature this week. Partnering with local governments to improve our region is critical to ensuring a strong economic comeback. https://t.co/rNIoeABRtH

This #NationalFarmersDay we honor the truly incredible work of the farmers in #NY27 and around the country that kept food on our tables during the pandemic.  It’s an honor to represent you! https://t.co/Gd12bZGRSH

Honored to present the Lockport Challenger Learning Center a new flag flown over the US Capitol.  They provide an excellent hands-on education experience in STEM fields. I am impressed with their model and will work to create more opportunities like this for #NY27 students. https://t.co/gjvUui9UjK

Excellent news for students – @USDA has extended free meals for kids through the end of the school year. I was proud to successfully call for additional flexibilities earlier this year and am glad students will continue to get the support they need.https://t.co/3kHtNZ1Uui

Rural hospitals are critical to ensuring residents of #NY27 receive medical care especially during the pandemic. I recently cosponsored legislation to ensure WNY rural hospitals can access the resources they need to keep providing high quality care. https://t.co/oYeyQsMgQW

One of my top priorities is a strong economic recovery from COVID-19. I’ve been working with my colleagues to release more #PPP funds to our hardest-hit small businesses - I also recently cosponsored 4 bills to rebuild our economy.https://t.co/awTaFR0ZR5
I am honored to announce my office is now accepting nominations to recognize outstanding veterans in #NY27. If you know a veteran you would like to nominate please visit: https://t.co/2cSLFfpqgi

Honored to join @themiastore this afternoon for the grand opening of their Depew location.  An excellent Western New York company that promotes American goods and American jobs. Congrats! https://t.co/0HVs2mTMHa

The @NTSB needs to make a plan to safely conduct an investigation into Friday’s plane crash.  In order for a full and accurate investigation to be conducted it must be done promptly to gather all critical evidence and information. https://t.co/LqhdQXDJND
My prayers are with the President and First Lady. I’m wishing them a swift and full recovery. https://t.co/e96Q9YblHv

I have repeatedly said we need a bipartisan COVID-19 relief bill that addresses the most pressing needs of American families small businesses and farmers.  Tonight the Speaker once again chose to politicize this issue rather than pass meaningful legislation.  My statement: https://t.co/rADp5Q1MIJ

The #ChineseCommunistParty presents a clear threat to national security.  I commend @China_TaskForce for their detailed plan to secure our supply chains prevent IP theft and hold China accountable for their lies and manipulation in response to COVID-19 https://t.co/VdbMNvRN41 https://t.co/hkCvV3Fyx0

I’ve seen firsthand the effectiveness of the @USDA Farmers to Families Food Box Program here in #NY27.   100 million boxes delivered is an incredible achievement that has supported millions of families and farmers during the pandemic.  https://t.co/fPntCDO685

I signed @HerreraBeutler’s petition to force a vote on HR 8265 to release unspent #paycheckprotectionprogram funds.   There’s no place for political games during a pandemic. I urge all my colleagues to support this legislation and support struggling small businesses. https://t.co/Em2o0pTXBz

Great to join Secretary of Labor Scalia and other New York State elected officials this afternoon to discuss the workforce issues facing Western New York.   We had a productive discussion and I look forward to a partnership that delivers for hardworking Americans. https://t.co/3roCgJaTCr

Honored to recognize Bill and Peggy Mayberry this morning at the 15th Annual Key to the Locks Award in Lockport. Their work to revitalize Lockport and their dedication to their community is incredible. Congrats! https://t.co/qvYwmgmxEa

America’s hardest hit small businesses are not pawns in a partisan game.   I was proud to stand for them and the 50000+ jobs saved in #NY27 by calling for a second round of Paycheck Protection Program loans.   We need to pass this legislation immediately https://t.co/GbLCo2uzHn
Proud to have announced $17 million in rural water development funding this morning for #NY27. For more information visit: https://t.co/Bf9IiAyEKC

The #paycheckprotectionprogram saved 51M jobs and 12M rural jobs.   Small business drives WNY and I’m proud to represent the over 130000 small business employees in #NY27.   We need to act now and deliver more #PPP resources for them and all of America’s small businesses. https://t.co/sPTdfDEln4

The Chinese Communist Party’s record of human rights violations is appalling.  I was proud to speak on the floor yesterday in support of the Uyghur people and to call for further measures to hold China accountable. https://t.co/iKQkiltNg4
Proud to have successfully fought for the inclusion of critical funding for programs that support our rural communities in tonight’s spending bill. My full statement: https://t.co/5afSaWHIDg

“The Commodity Credit Corporation has supported farmers for decades and has always been replenished by Congress without question.”  Now is not the time to play political games with our farmers and rural communities. We must include this critical funding.  https://t.co/sDdD8vcftZ

This Small Business Week we recognize the resiliency of our small businesses. I’ll keep fighting for critical support they need now and Im working to advance policies that unleash their potential. When America’s small businesses succeed our nation prospers https://t.co/WF9O3axfHs
Beautiful day for the Pembroke Corfu Darien Kiwanis Club Car show. It was great to speak with and meet people enjoying some normalcy for a great cause! https://t.co/KmX5mawCvq
I’m deeply saddened to learn of Justice Ginsburg’s passing.  My full statement: https://t.co/kHHEaYEhW4

On this day we remember the thousands of Americans who lost their lives and the brave men and women who ran into the chaos to help their countrymen. Never forget the lives we lost and the heroic sacrifices made #NeverForget https://t.co/UWoqWDGg8t

America's workforce has been the driver of our economy and the backbone of our communities for decades. Today we celebrate the men and women who have built our great nation and reaffirm our commitment to our great american workers https://t.co/yRtImtKlNu

The @USDA Farmers to Families Food Box program was successful at supporting local farmers and distributors especially right here in WNY. HH Dobbins used this program to maintain operations and employment to supply families around the US with fresh food https://t.co/EWKRNGp1bA https://t.co/PWArezAG6M

Very interesting meeting this morning with @CobblestoneMuse to learn more about the history of our region and what more can be done to build up our great historic sites right here in our Western New York backyard https://t.co/6P0DcPJbaR

Great meeting with childcare providers this morning to discuss many of the issues daycare centers are facing specifically funding that the Governor has refused to release from the CARES Act. They also updated me on their work to operate safely to protect children and staff https://t.co/40xZsLMmYK

Excellent meeting with Western New York Letter Carriers. I received an update on current local operations and we discussed short and long-term problems facing our postal service and what I can do to support them and ensure quality service for Western New Yorkers https://t.co/QAxnBhaX2M

The #paycheckprotectionprogram saved 51M jobs in the US especially 12M in rural communities. Getting Americans back to work safely is key to rebuilding our economy. We’re fighting to expand this highly successful program for more small businesses https://t.co/GhyqNeiGBM

Today we celebrate 75 years since our victory over Japan in WWII. The Greatest Generation served our nation with bravery - their service and sacrifice makes us all proud to be Americans and we are forever grateful #VJDay75 https://t.co/pUq4Q6FTmI

Excellent tour yesterday at the  @geneseecouncil to learn about the vital work they are doing to combat opioid crisis in our Western New York community - I am committed to working with them to end this epidemic that has taken far too many lives in our community https://t.co/0oKF7XCMO1

Great to meet with Batavia Town Supervisor Greg Post yesterday. We discussed the needs of his community and the necessity of rural infrastructure development especially expanding access to water resources https://t.co/rJE3lHgePf

Visiting our local governments and discussing the needs of our communities with local officials is a top priority of mine. It was great to sit down with the Orleans County Legislature and discuss what I can do to help improve our area https://t.co/tlIEzDDp78

Thank you @SecretarySonny for authorizing flexibilities in Child Nutrition Programs so schools can be better prepared to cater to the needs of our students and ensure students and families can fully focus on learning in this unprecedented time https://t.co/QImUpRbsn4

Proud to join my colleagues from @HouseAgGOP and @EdLaborGOP in calling for increased flexibility for the Child Nutrition Program as we approach the upcoming school year. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/QfvmW1yzSM

Great to visit WNY Energy in Medina that makes ethanol out of local corn crops. Another successful Agri-business in our region providing direct jobs for 50 workers and supports jobs for local farms and other partners. Thanks CEO Tim Winters for taking time to meet with me today https://t.co/zAur1XmXvA

I strongly urge Gov. Cuomo to join numerous states around the country and provide the much needed enhanced unemployment benefits authorized by @realdonaldtrump in his recent executive order. New Yorker’s are struggling and need protection as we work to rebuild the economy

Proud to announce the @USDA has awarded a great #NY27 town the Village of Perry a $100000 award to bolster recreational trail mapping and tourism in our area. Excellent news for one of our local communities https://t.co/HbjsCMGtJV

Incredible tour today at OLEDWorks in Rochester. Their work building cutting edge technology and their passion for expanding American manufacturing are a great example of America’s best. As we work to rebuild our economy I’m pushing for policies to create more great US companies https://t.co/HMP5EHEq25

Today I joined the Genesee County Legislature to discuss my first few weeks in office especially my appointment to @HouseAgGOP and my commitment to working to expand access to rural broadband and expand opportunities and resources for rural communities #NY27 https://t.co/fPWGnx8w6P

This afternoon I joined the Ontario County Board of Supervisors to discuss my work in Washington to support Western New York towns small businesses and agriculture and also to receive an update on the needs of communities in the county moving forward https://t.co/e4dZ9X5tTb

Great to tour FF Thompson Hospital in Canandaigua this afternoon and receive an update on what they are doing to provide consistent quality care to patients and expand services for Western New Yorkers. Our hospitals servicing rural areas are critical to our communities https://t.co/y08COF3lgR

Today we celebrate the 100th anniversary of the #19thamendment and honor the hard work and bravery of all the women who relentlessly pursued equality and fought for this victory https://t.co/9q1pD6S5re

This afternoon I joined Assm. Norris  Mayor Lawson and business leaders in Wilson to discuss our efforts to address high water levels on Lake Ontario. Solving this problem is critical to small businesses and residents along the lakeshore https://t.co/0lkIFdrwvM

It was awesome to tour Lockport’s Challenger Learning Center today. As someone who has worked to expand educational opportunities seeing the work they are doing to offer kids hands on instruction in STEM fields is incredible - keep up the great work! https://t.co/vszxX6KRCN

Wonderful morning in Lockport today I toured the Lockport Locks Flight of 5 with Mayor Roman and Legislator Nemi and received an update on economic develoment in the City. I’m looking forward to helping boost small businesses and local economies in our great #NY27 towns https://t.co/HaA4TcRZOf

Great to be in Batavia today to celebrate and honor County Manager Jay Gsell for his retirement. Jay served Genesee County honorably for 27 years and he will be missed. Wishing him best of luck in his next chapter! https://t.co/tlckF5VuaO

I’m proud to stand with over 100 of my colleagues in support of our great dairy farmers. As we continue to work through this pandemic ensuring dairy market expansion provisions of the #USMCA are adhered to is critical to Western New York and American farmers #NY27 https://t.co/0TZaxpYtP3

Today marks a historic agreement between two American allies and moves us closer toward stability in the Middle East and squandering Iranian aggression. Read my full statement: https://t.co/tFtnUJxLEG

I was honored to celebrate and recognize two distinguished members of the Eden Police Department – Chief Felschow and Lieutenant McCarthy for their decades of selfless service to our community. Thank you and enjoy retirement! https://t.co/EiOEGmorIc

Great to tour Performance Advantage Company (PAC) in Lancaster. This local company is leveraging the power of American manufacturing and innovation. Rebuilding our economy means building more great American companies like PAC https://t.co/n9ZSyAI1ba

Today I met with Alden Supervisor Dean Adamski and also got a tour of his small business – DD’s Ranch – right here in Alden. Great to meet with a local community leader and also discuss current second amendment issues https://t.co/iw5DPwFaGz

Proud to announce this @HHSGov grant for @geneseecouncil so they can continue their critical work combatting substance abuse in our communities and helping more residents reach long-term recovery https://t.co/AOWlvTzBfo

Yesterday @realDonaldTrump made the American people a priority and signed four executive orders to build our economy and provide targeted relief for Americans during this crisis https://t.co/A001GqLKBQ

Great to welcome a new small business to Western New York this morning - Gabe’s on the Hill Thrift Shoppe in Colden. Honored to recognize their service to their community and I wish them success! https://t.co/QXjVXDCTqB

#Reminder this Saturday August 8th is the last day to apply for the #PaycheckProtectionProgram. @HouseGOP are working hard to make sure additional funding is included in the next stimulus so more small businesses can be supported by this successful program https://t.co/VlyvbdsfgD
Happy 230th Birthday to @USCG https://t.co/o7CXP7Kd5W

.@realdonaldtrump is taking decisive action to support and improve telehealth services for millions of Americans through improvement of our rural communications infrastructure. Excellent news for Western New Yorkers living in our rural communities!   https://t.co/h393YccoaM

Great to join @news4buffalo yesterday to discuss my work to aid our shoreline communities and businesses impacted by flood damage.  We also talked about my priorities to help: ✔️small businesses  ✔️farmers ✔️expand broadband access https://t.co/Xrtr0uVebf

Finally it also contains provisions which would erode religious liberties and hurt second amendment protections. As we work to ensure the safety and security of all Americans this legislation raises serious concerns and that is why I voted against it. (5/5)

It doesn't fund the border wall and prevents seized funds from being used to secure our southern border it also hurts efforts to address backlogs of immigration cases allowing for potential criminals to stay in our country longer while holding up legal immigration (4/5)

It prevents Law Enforcement from receiving needed equipment such as bulletproof vests underfunds federal enforcement agencies and holds hostage funding for school protection and drug trafficking investigations until states and municipalities enact partisan reform measures (3/5)

This legislation repeals Authorizations of Military force (AUMF) - greatly reducing the ability to carry out counter-terrorism operations and weakens national security by emboldening Iran to attack us or our allies without fear of retribution (2/5)

Today I voted against H.R. 7617 – a massive piece of legislation that exceeds budget limits and includes many provisions which hurt our military readiness weaken law enforcement and encourage illegal immigration (1/5)

It was an honor today to give the opening prayer and Pledge of Allegiance during our Republican Conference meeting especially that today we celebrate the 64th anniversary of our country adopting “In God We Trust” as our national motto https://t.co/tnz29orBzi
Thank you @CongressmanGT! https://t.co/QU9TfArrAS

Great meeting with @ConawayTX11 today. We discussed a number of important issues to NY27 including dairy prices the USMCA and concerns about China. Im honored to join the @HouseAgGOP and I look forward to fighting for our WNY farmers and ag industry https://t.co/iueMwketd2 https://t.co/K5zmi2ZLlF

Yesterday I helped pass the Water Resources Development Act (WRDA). This legislation authorizes a comprehensive study to find ways to improve flood management and will benefit our region immensely especially those residents and businesses along our lakeshore. https://t.co/G3A0Jv0qLy

Kodak and President Trump are making national security and American jobs a priority. Kodak is being awarded a loan to help strengthen domestic pharmaceutical supply chains and is creating 300 new WNY Jobs. A big win for our region and country https://t.co/7QeKyY4tRy

Community members living on the lakeshore have continually raised concern and called for further action to address rising water levels and continuous flooding. This report highlights more must be done to engage stakeholders and improve our plan of action https://t.co/XNGQRTS0Iz
Honored to be officially representing the great people of New York’s 27th Congressional District.  Full video: https://t.co/XSV3grUxNs https://t.co/OullHtu82H
